the formula will not update multiple records in a data source named Toolbox if the records exist. The Collect function adds records to a data source, but it does not modify or delete existing records.

Yes, 
a local collection is created to store data if a data source named Toolbox does not already exist. The Collect function creates a new collection if the specified data source does not exist.

No,
 if a collection named Toolbox exists, the formula will not clear any existing records before making any changes. The Collect function preserves the existing records in a collection and adds new ones to it. To clear all the records in a collection, you need to use the Clear or ClearCollect function.
